thread.title: First AC double-decker Shatabdi train to run between Mumbai, Goa
thread.title_full: First AC double-decker Shatabdi train to run between Mumbai, Goa

author: tribuneindia.com
title: First AC double-decker Shatabdi train to run between Mumbai, Goa
text:
New Delhi, October 24
India’s first AC double-decker Shatabdi train will soon run between Mumbai and Goa. Goa, a popular beach destination in the country, attracts tourists from all over the country and the proposed double-decker service will be a boost to tourism, a senior Railway Ministry official said. There is a proposal to run the train between Mumbai and Goa to cater to the growing demand by tourists, the official said. The first double-decker air-conditioned train between Howrah and Dhanbad was flagged off in October 2011, and since then the service is operational between many cities, including Ahmadabad-Mumbai, Chennai–Bangalore, Delhi-Jaipur and Delhi-Lucknow. Shatabdi Express, a premier service of the Railways, connect Metro cities with other cities important for tourism, pilgrimage or business. Shatabdi trains return to the station of origin the same day. AC double-decker trains are equipped with modern amenities and its coaches have special features for comfortable travelling with a seating capacity for around 1,500 passengers. — PTI
